name: Henropoly
shortDescription: Final project of SoyHenry's full stack development bootcamp. Henropoly is an online replica of the famous board game Monopoly created by Henry students designed for Henry's community.
description: Henropoly is an online replica of the famous board game Monopoly created by Henry students designed for Henry's community. It can be enjoyed by 2 to 4 players through a multiplayer system where each one competes to avoid bankruptcy and to reach the end of the game.

name: Dogs App
shortDescription: App for searching, creating and filtering dog breeds using an API.
description: App for searching, creating and filtering dog breeds using an API using Node.js, React, Redux, Express, Sequelize, Postgres and Style Components.

name: Food App
shortDescription: App for searching, creating and filtering recipes using an API.
description: App for searching, creating and filtering recipes using an API using Node.js, React, Redux, Express, Sequelize, Postgres and Css.

name: Personal portfolio
shortDescription: My personal portfolio! The page I made to introduce myself and show the projects I've worked on. This page is intended to be easy-to-understand, fast, functional and practical.
description:
My personal portfolio! The page I made to introduce myself and show the projects I've worked on.
I designed this page to be extremly performant, fast and accessible so that people can easily see my work and contact me.
I chose NextJS as the framework to build this website in order to make it as fast and efficient as possible using all the features it includes such as SSG, optimized images, SSR optimizations, etc.

name: Ecommerce
shortDescription: Ecommerce page with different items for purchase.
description: Ecommerce website using Mern Stack that is scalable and future proof. I have used React for frontend and Redux for state management, Node JS and Express for backend with MongoDB as database.

name: Netflix
description: Mern Stack Netflix app clone. React, Node.js, MongoDB movie app. Full Stack Netflix application using JWT, React Hooks and Context API.
